tasks.title: Rename .mahabharatha/ runtime scripts from troubleshoot to debug
tasks.description: 1. Copy .mahabharatha/troubleshoot.py to .mahabharatha/debug.py. In debug.py, rename: all docstrings 'troubleshoot'→'debug', 'Troubleshoot'→'Debug', class names TroubleshootPhase→DebugPhase, TroubleshootConfig→DebugConfig, TroubleshootCommand→DebugCommand. 2. Copy .mahabharatha/tests/test_troubleshoot.py to .mahabharatha/tests/test_debug.py. In test_debug.py, change all 'from troubleshoot import' to 'from debug import', rename all class/docstring refs. 3. Delete old files .mahabharatha/troubleshoot.py and .mahabharatha/tests/test_troubleshoot.py.
acceptance_criteria: No 'Troubleshoot' class name prefix remains in new files

verification.command: test -f .mahabharatha/debug.py && test -f .mahabharatha/tests/test_debug.py && ! test -f .mahabharatha/troubleshoot.py && ! test -f .mahabharatha/tests/test_troubleshoot.py && cd .mahabharatha && python -m pytest tests/test_debug.py -x -q 2>&1 | tail -3

tasks.title: Fix installed commands and stray ref in mahabharatha:debug.md
tasks.description: 1. In mahabharatha/data/commands/mahabharatha:debug.md, line 14, change 'Interactive troubleshooting wizard mode' to 'Interactive debugging wizard mode'. 2. Run: cd /Users/klambros/PycharmProjects/MAHABHARATHA && python -m mahabharatha install-commands --force to reinstall all commands. This removes stale mahabharatha:troubleshoot.md from .claude/commands/ and installs mahabharatha:debug.md + z:debug.md. 3. Verify .claude/commands/ has mahabharatha:debug.md and no mahabharatha:troubleshoot.md.

tasks.title: Update user-facing documentation (backlog, coverage)
tasks.description: 1. tasks/COVERAGE-100-BACKLOG.md: Replace 'mahabharatha/commands/troubleshoot.py' with 'mahabharatha/commands/debug.py', 'test_troubleshoot_full.py' with 'test_debug_full.py', 'test_troubleshoot_cmd.py' with 'test_debug_cmd.py', and update coverage import paths. 2. claudedocs/backlog.md: Update item 11 from Partial to Completed, move to Completed section with today's date, update item 4 historical entry to clarify it now refers to debug.py.
acceptance_criteria: claudedocs/backlog.md item 11 is in Completed section

verification.command: ! grep 'troubleshoot\.py' tasks/COVERAGE-100-BACKLOG.md && grep -A1 '| 11 |' claudedocs/backlog.md | grep -q 'Completed\|2026-01-30' && echo 'OK'

tasks.title: Update .gsd task history docs
tasks.description: Update historical task references in .gsd/tasks/: (1) .gsd/tasks/prompts/L3-quality-commands.md: Replace '/mahabharatha:troubleshoot' with '/mahabharatha:debug', 'troubleshoot.md' with 'debug.md', 'troubleshoot.py' with 'debug.py'. (2) .gsd/tasks/prompts/README.md: Replace 'troubleshoot' with 'debug' in the task table. (3) .gsd/tasks/documentation/BACKLOG.md: Replace 'troubleshoot' with 'debug'. (4) .gsd/tasks/cli-commands-tests/BACKLOG.md: Replace 'troubleshoot' with 'debug' in all file paths and command references.
acceptance_criteria: No 'troubleshoot' command/file refs in listed .gsd/tasks/ files
All references point to debug equivalents

tasks.title: Quality gates and final verification
tasks.description: 1. Run ruff check on all modified files. 2. Run mypy on mahabharatha/. 3. Run full test suite. 4. Grep -ri troubleshoot across entire project, excluding: .git/, .gsd/specs/troubleshoot-enhancement/, .gsd/specs/z-shortcut-and-rename/, __pycache__/, .gsd/tasks/PROGRESS.md. Remaining hits should only be English words (e.g., 'troubleshooting' in README) or completed backlog entries. 5. Verify .claude/commands/ has no mahabharatha:troubleshoot.md.
acceptance_criteria: No stray troubleshoot refs outside allowed contexts

verification.command: ruff check mahabharatha/ tests/ && python -m pytest tests/ -x -q 2>&1 | tail -5 && ! test -f .claude/commands/mahabharatha:troubleshoot.md && echo 'ALL GATES PASSED'

conflict_matrix.description: No file ownership conflicts - each file owned by exactly one task
